snippet: Accountemps is seeking an Accounts Payable Specialist for a role in Minneapolis. Candidate will be main point of contact for Accounts Payable duties, which...
teaser:
Accountemps is seeking an Accounts Payable Specialist for a role in Minneapolis. Candidate will be main point of contact for Accounts Payable duties, which includes processing approximately 400 invoices per week in Great Plains. Candidates who have previously coded invoices in preferred. Please call us today if interested in this position. 612-339-5521
Intermediate Accounts Payable, Intermediate Journal Entries, Intermediate Bank Reconciliations, Basic Accounts Receivable, Intermediate Great Plains Accounting, Intermediate MS Excel
